channel.title: Mark Strahl
channel.description: Recent news about Mark Strahl, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Ten meetings in the office today. Topics included education, gun registry, skills training, tourism, agri policies, and infrastructure $$.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: 7 TDs, 462 yards, no INTs. #Broncos Peyton Manning just broke the QB rating scale. Great start to the #NFL season.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Hoping for good things from Peyton Manning and the Broncos this year. Love watching him run an offence. #nohuddle #audiblesforeveryone

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Congrats to Pacific Salmon Foundation @psf and Ducks Unlimited @DUCinBC for partnering with the Gov of Canada to improve local fish habitat.

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Progress
item.description:
Strahl to run in new Chilliwack-Hope riding
By Alina Konevski - Chilliwack Progress Published: August 27, 2013 12:00 PM. A recently concluded reorganization of federal electoral boundaries will see local Member of Parliament Mark Strahl running in the new Chilliwack-Hope riding in the next election.

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Times
item.description:
Strahl will run in newly configured riding
An election may be two years off, but local MP Mark Strahl announced in a press release Friday he would seek re-election. Strahl's announcement comes on the heels of the Federal Electoral Boundaries Commission final report tabled Wednesday. The new ...

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Times
item.description:
Strahl will seek re-election in 2015, says new Chilliwack riding makes sense
Chilliwack-Fraser Canyon MP Mark Strahl said he will run in the 2015 federal election in the newly configured riding of Chilliwack-Hope. Previous Next. Chilliwack-Fraser Canyon MP Mark Strahl said he will run in the 2015 federal election in the newly ...

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Progress
item.description:
Loyalist Day feted with flag raising at Chilliwack City Hall
loyalistflagJUL22-13.jpg. Mayor Sharon Gaetz and MP Mark Strahl joined costumed members of the Chilliwack branch of the United Empire Loyalists' Association of Canada to raise the First Union flag at Chilliwack City Hall at 9 a.m. on July 22. submitted.

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Times
item.description:
Urge our MP to stop illegal spying
I must voice my disappointment with our local MP, Mark Strahl. He remains focused on the issue of local legal marijuana grow-ops during a time when laws protecting our personal privacy are being casually and routinely violated. The latest "Have Your Say!

item.title: Mentioned by Chilliwack Times
item.description:
Unborn victims deserve rights
An open letter to Mark Strahl, MP regarding "Putting victims' rights first" column in the June 18 Chilliwack Times. Mr. Strahl, there is no doubt that the intention of this bill is honourable and that your support of it is commendable. This private member's bill was ...
